bug.short_desc: Add Table-Widget to the next branch

long_desc.thetext: qx.ui.mobile.control.Table expects predefined markup consisting of a table/thead/tr/th structure where the text contents of the th elements define the column names. In order to fully support OO-style programming, the widget should be able to generate this markup itself, e.g. based on an array of column names.

We checked out the table and decided to give this task a bigger scope. As the table is sure an important widget, we want to do it right. The current implementation is a migrated website widget which needs to be refactored anyway. Additionally, it has 1200+ lines of code and not a single unit test nor a demo to showcase. So the new scope, which also includes the initial report:
- Think about the basic features a table widget should have - Think about a way to get those features implemented - Check if the current implementation could be used to fit those needs -- yes: refactor -- no: create a new table widget - Create a damo to showcase the widget - write unit tests
The new Table widget should live top-level in the ui namespace.
